title: Apartment for rent
description: Don't miss this great opportunity to lease this fully renovated one bedroom apartment in Historic Morrisville Borough with ALL utilities included (Natural gas heat, electric and water) in flat rate rent of $1300 a month. Brand new appliances, new flooring, fresh paint and easy access on street parking. Brand new washer and dryer in basement, which is shared with one downstairs tenant who is a quiet working professional. Large walk-out basement provides ample storage space. Large fenced yard. Size of unit is about 1000sqft., which includes a living room, kitchen, one bedroom and a finished attic that could be used as a 2nd bedroom. Will require references, credit check and a background check. First month, last month and security deposit required to move in ($3900 total). Easy access to Trenton, Princeton, Philly and Manhattan with the Trenton train station 2 miles away and super easy access to Business Route 1 and Interstate 95. Walking distance to the beautiful Delaware canal, river and park. Well behaved small and medium sized dogs okay and cats okay.

title: Roxborough Single Home with Off-Street Parking
description:
Renting Two Bedroom, Two Story Single Home with Off-Street Parking On One-Half Acre in Quiet Roxborough Neighborhood
This is the perfect single family home for a couple or two people who want to live in a beautiful green space. There is room to raise chickens, grow vegetables, and house an apiary. The property, which is 100 feet from Fairmount Park, includes 46 peach trees, two pear trees, two dogwoods, pine and cedar trees, and mature azaleas.
The home consists of two floors. On the first floor, there are three rooms, including a den and two other rooms that can be interchangeably used as dining room, living room or bedroom, as well as a full bathroom and a full kitchen (including refrigerator, stove, washing machine, and dryer). The second floor includes a bedroom, study/sitting room, and full bathroom. There is also a double basement for storage.
The house comes off-street parking, with a private driveway that can accommodate two cars. Ridge Avenue and the 9 bus are within a 5-minute walk. The Ivy Ridge train station with access to the R6 regional rail line is a short distance as are super markets, pharmacies, and restaurants.
The monthly rent is $1,450 not including utilities. Pets are welcome.
Occupancy is available May 2022.

The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping and dining! The Rittenhouse Market, Target, and Trader Joe's are nearby. Retail stores on Rittenhouse Row include Barnes & Noble, Anthropologie, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, and Madewell. Local restaurants include Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, Gran Caffe L'Aquila, and Marathon Grill. Sip a coffee at La Colombe. Buy bread at Metropolitan Bakery. title: Spacious 3BD Home with 2 CAR OFF-STREET PARKING
description:
Available early July:
Welcome to 203 Carpenter St! This gorgeous 3 bedroom / 2 bathroom townhome features 2 CAR OFF-STREET PARKING! Enter the home through a stylized vestibule, featuring lovely floral wallpaper and a charming, rounded interior door. Light hardwood floors and large front windows with lovely shutters brighten up the space, along with recessed lighting overhead. There’s a bar with built-in shelving separating the kitchen from the living / dining areas. The kitchen is a must see! A wide, galley style layout, raw edge wooden shelves, top of the line stainless steel appliances, (Wolf brand gas range with hood and warming drawer, dishwasher, garbage disposal, microwave), custom soapstone countertops, and clean white cabinetry complete the space. A sliding glass door leads from the kitchen to a large deck and your private 1-car garage! On the second floor, you’ll find two bedrooms, one of which features an exposed brick accent wall. The front bedroom has two street-side windows for lots of natural light, a large closet, and a lighted shelf cutout. The bathroom has an antique claw-foot tub, separate large stall shower, and modern vanity offering a unique mix of old and new features. The top floor is dedicated to the primary bedroom suite, with spacious bedroom including a decorative fireplace, large walk-in closet, and an updated bathroom down the hall. The bathroom has a large frameless glass shower with marble tiling, and a lighted vanity with storage. Washer and dryer are in the basement, along with additional storage and sink. Don’t forget about your off-street parking – one car can fit in your garage and the other outside of it (use rear entrance on Hall Street for parking access). Call us for a tour today!

title: Terrific Location! Amiable 1BD with Modern Kitchen - Must See
description:
Available mid-April:
Welcome to 2109 Spruce St #2F! This beautiful 1 bedroom / 1 bathroom second-floor apartment features parking for COMPACT car for only $250/month! Enter into a little hallway that opens into the common area, boasting hardwood floors, high ceilings, and tall windows that douse the room in natural sunlight. There is a ceiling fan for year-round comfort and even enough room for a dining table right in front of the tall windows overlooking the tree-lined Spruce Street. The modern kitchen offers granite countertops, gas range, lots of cabinets and extra space for additional storage or a small breakfast nook. Hardwood floors continue into the bedroom, which has two separate closets and a ceiling fan. You can access your bathroom through the bedroom. Modern bathroom fixtures include lighted medicine cabinet, subway tiled bathtub with shower head, and energy-efficient toilet. This sunny apartment is located in a beautiful brownstone in one of the most sought after neighborhoods in Center City. Schedule your tour today!

title: Showstopping 3 bed 2 bath home in Fitler Square available August 1st!
description:
515 S. 27th Street – Available August 1
This 4 story Fitler Square Home is a gem in the highly desired Fitler Square neighborhood. Perfectly situated a block away from the Schuylkill (Taney) Park and just at the foot of the South Street bridge leading to UPenn, CHOP, and Drexel. There is not a better location to enjoy all the benefits of Center City, with the accessibility to University City.
The home features an open concept layout, with exposed brick and beams, as well as the ample lighting provided by the overhead skylight which catches your eye as you walk through the front door into the living room. Pass through the dining room as you enter the kitchen which has been completely updated with Stainless steel appliances, granite counter tops, maple cabinets, glass /slate backsplash, and a porcelain tile floor with radiant heating below, finished with a convenient granite breakfast bar. Off of the kitchen is a quaint rear outdoor area, ideal for a grilling and relaxing on your patio table. The entire home has been updated with dark hand-scraped maple hardwood floors, custom trim work and neutral yet classic freshly painted walls.
Go up the open staircase to the 2nd floor, which boasts the master bedroom complete with recessed lighting, ceiling fan and his/her California-style closets, as well as an additional storage closet. As well, there is a newly remodeled custom bathroom with enclosed glass shower including porcelain floor and wall tile and stone/glass mosaic accent wall. The exposed brick wall follows you up to the third floor which features another remodeled bathroom with full tub, as well as a bedroom with brick fireplace and a 3rd nice sized bedroom.
Truly unique to this home for this area of the city is the 400+sf finished basement. Use this area as an entertainment area, child’s play room, or office. This room features recessed lighting, wall to wall sculpted carpeting, HDMI hook-up, flatscreen mount, built in entertainment shelving, enclosed laundry area, and ample storage.
Convenient to Rittenhouse Square, UPenn, CHOP, Drexel, Fitler Square park, Taney Park, Graduate Hospital, Philadelphia Airport, and of course all of the restaurants, coffee shops, bars and overall neighborhood feel which makes Fitler Square one of the City’s most desirable neighborhoods.
Due with signing of the lease: First month’s rent, last month’s rent, 1 month security deposit

title: 2 BR / 2 BA House with Garage
description:
Why rent an apartment when you can have a whole house?
2 bedroom, 2 bath charming townhome located steps away from Rittenhouse Square and in the heart of Center City. The house comes with a single car garage large enough to house a full size SUV, as well as bikes, trash cans, etc. The house features plenty of recessed lighting, oak hardwood floors and a gas fireplace, perfect for snuggling on cold winter nights. Updated kitchen includes stainless appliances including dishwasher, built-in microwave and refrigerator with ice-maker. Upstairs you'll find 2 bedrooms each with their own bathroom as well as lots of light via windows and skylights.
The finished basement can be used as a den / office, also houses the washer / dryer and separate storage room. House is convenient to all of Center City / Rittenhouse neighborhood. Close to public transportation, the Broad Street line, the South Street Bridge and all the city has to offer.
Available 05/15/22, possibly sooner. Small pets welcome. Short term (6, 9, or 12 months) available.

description:

Make sure you check out the beautiful updated kitchen with stainless steel appliance. Unfinished basement is great for storage and washer/dryer on the 3rd floor makes it easy to do wash. All 4 bedrooms have plenty of space and large ample closets. The master bedroom is located on the 2ndfloor with an ensuite bathroom. The 2ndbedroom also has its own private bathroom as well making this a wonderful rental for multiple tenants. The location could not be better, steps away from Pizzeria Beddia, Murphs, Milk Crate, Johnny Hots, EKTA, Johnny Brendas, Garage, Joe's Steaks, Fette Sau, Penn Treaty Park and all Frankford Ave has to offer. Also for travel in and out of the city you are conveniently located close to I95 N&S and the EL. Property is vacant and available for rent immediately, easy to show. Very high walk and bike score.

title: a premier apartment community located in the popular place
description:
Welcome to The Residences at The Block, a premier apartment community located in the popular Northern Liberties neighborhood. This 1BR Bi-level includes a small room (office space) once you enter. Finishes include modern stainless steel appliances, contemporary two-tone kitchen cabinets, clean white solid surface countertops, textured white backsplash, hickory wood flooring, stone texture tile in bathrooms, sleek black fixtures in the bathroom. The Deck is a vibrant social space that has brightly colored flexible seating for gatherings & activities, gravel gardens with cozy fire pits, lush raised planting beds, a dog park with an outdoor shower, and the best part expansive views of Center City skyline. The Commons is a warm and inviting front lobby which includes a communal fireplace and cozy lounge for late-night conversations. The Block is built on a foundation of convenience with easy access to countless amenities in SoNo. Located in the heart of Northern Liberties, a vibrant neighborhood bustling with community activities, arts, entertainment, restaurants, and businesses of all kinds. Aside from the Yards Brewery, NoLibs is home to a variety of restaurants and bars including the Silk City, North 3rd, Honey's Sit-n-Eat, and Cafe La Maude. Target is just across the street. In regards to transportation, the Market Frankford El and several bus routes are close by, giving you an easy commute to Center City. Neighborhoods like Fishtown and Old City are only a few blocks away with even more options. Enjoy all this vibrant neighborhood has to offer!

Application Process - There is $50.00 non-refundable application fee and a one-time lease administration fee of $25.00. Applicants must put up three months’ rent to move in (first months’ rent and two (2) months’ security deposit).  Del Val  will review your income(s), credit, rental and employment history and other information in order to verify that you qualify for the property.  To apply online please go to www.delvalproperty.com and click on Tenants, then Rental Application.
Our Resident Benefits Program is included with all Del Val Leases and includes many benefits. One of the benefits is our ZeroDeposit Program using “Obligo.com” which is an alternative to traditional security deposits. For qualified residents this allows you to forego your two (2) months of security deposits. If you elect to participate in our ZeroDeposit Program there are additional fees. For more details please go to our website at www.delvalproperty.com and click on Zero Deposit Program. Additional benefits include Online Rent Payment, Concierge Utility Service, One-time Late Fee Forgiveness, One-time Non-sufficient Funds Forgiveness and many more. The cost for the Resident Benefit Program is $15.00 and is included in your monthly rent.
